Text.Page:
Well, I have to confess that I haven't made this potion in quite a while. I do hope it still works as intended.

I mean...I'm sure it will! I just...you know.

Well, anyway. Bottoms up, eh? Good luck.

You had the potion, eh? How was it? I thought you'd bring it back here for me, but seeing how I could smell you coming from down the road, I'm actually glad you drank it instead.

Well, I guess the only thing left to do is see if you can get anything out of the tuwangi. Better head straight over to {@LinkCreature:205#1020#Baba Tuwangi Captive Tangmo} and see how that goes.

Let me know what you find out.
Hmm. What is that? It smells like skin. And despair.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What, precisely, does despair smell like?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Hmm? It understands. I can tell you what's happening. You want to know why the swamp is getting bigger? Have YOU never wanted a bigger house?

Of course we're behind itâ€”we're expanding!

Oh, no. So it's the tuwangi, then? That's just not any good. That means...oh dear.

Well, thank you so much for your help. Please take this.
